meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Claudia Hochstein Brandon Brooks Sean Sullivan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7670.

td.p: Claudia Hochstein, an environmental program administrator from Saint Paul, Minnesota
Brandon Brooks, an HR manager from Chicago, Illinois
Sean Sullivan, a financial adviser from Verona, New Jersey (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,000)

tr.td: FEAR FACTOR
NHL LOGOS
TAKE ME "DOWN"
TO THE SALT LAKE CITY
WHERE THE GRASS IS GREEN
AND THE GIRLS ARE PRETTY

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Brandon: What is electricity to plug in your phone?)

a mobile phone

SeanBrandon
Triple Stumper
')
